achievements.name: Diplomatic
achievements.description: Perform a hostage trade.

achievements.name: Cheney?
achievements.description: Defeat a Bulldozer with a shotgun.

achievements.name: Intimidating
achievements.description: Get a Heavy SWAT to give up.

achievements.name: Left for dead
achievements.description: Finish a heist in custody while all your team mates are alive. (4 teammates).

achievements.name: Blood in, blood out
achievements.description: Trade all the butchers in SLAUGHTERHOUSE. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: A bridge too far!
achievements.description: Complete the GREEN BRIDGE on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Dodge this!
achievements.description: Beat a heist on normal difficulty or above, having killed a Bulldozer without taking damage from any Bulldozer. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: But how?
achievements.description: Get the armored car to drop without shooting at it in SLAUGHTERHOUSE. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Last man standing
achievements.description: Beat a heist after having been the only one alive. (4 teammates).

achievements.name: Windowlicker
achievements.description: Defeat a law enforcer planting C4 in FIRST WORLD BANK on hard difficulty or above. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Civil disobedience
achievements.description: Defeat 100 law enforcers in a single heist.

achievements.name: Are there more than two?
achievements.description: Find ten money bundles in PANIC ROOM.

achievements.name: You can run but you can't hide
achievements.description: In PANIC ROOM, take the key from Chavez within the first 45 seconds of starting the mission. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Shinobi
achievements.description: Bypassing all 3 consoles before raising the alarm, beat DIAMOND HEIST on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Are those the blue ones?
achievements.description: Steal all the sapphires in DIAMOND HEIST on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Gold digger
achievements.description: Beat SLAUGHTERHOUSE within 15 minutes, taking all the gold. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Stand together
achievements.description: Beat HEAT STREET on normal difficulty or above without anyone getting downed. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Quick draw
achievements.description: In PANIC ROOM, kill all armed thugs in and around the apartment building within 60 seconds of you and your crew drawing your weapons. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: No photos
achievements.description: Destroy all the cameras in FIRST WORLD BANK within 10 seconds of drawing your weapons. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Hot lava
achievements.description: Don't let any law enforcers reach the graffiti on the center of the roof in PANIC ROOM from the SECURE THE ROOF objective until the ESCAPE objective on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Federal crime
achievements.description: Defeat 25 FBI agents in a row.

achievements.name: One shot, one kill - repeat
achievements.description: Get 30 kills using 30 shots, using only the M308 Rifle.

achievements.name: Bomb man
achievements.description: In DIAMOND HEIST, defeat all twelve Patrol Guards using only trip mines. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Are you ready yet?
achievements.description: In DIAMOND HEIST, get Bain to come back for you at least 7 times on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: PAYDAY
achievements.description: Aquire one billion dollars in total cash. One. BILLION. Dollars.

achievements.name: Easy street
achievements.description: Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL difficulty, with your group accuracy being at 60% or higher. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: I pushed the button and lived!
achievements.description: In DIAMOND HEIST, get the big diamond and escape on OVERKILL difficulty with you and all your team mates alive. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Noob herder
achievements.description: Beat any heist on OVERKILL difficulty with three other players who are all using the Noob Lube perk. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Don't lose face
achievements.description: Beat all heists on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Eagle eyes
achievements.description: Point out a special enemy using the "shout out" command.

achievements.name: I ain't afraid no more
achievements.description: Gain a level in the Assault tree during an assault.

achievements.name: Crack-bang
achievements.description: Gain a level in the Sharpshooter tree with your last kill being a Sniper.

achievements.name: Lay on hands
achievements.description: Gain a level in the Support tree while reviving a teammate.

achievements.name: Darkness
achievements.description: On GREEN BRIDGE, destroy all the lights in the main scaffolding tower. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Last Christmas
achievements.description: In multiplayer, find a Christmas present in any heist.

achievements.name: You are GOLDEN! OVERKILL salutes you!
achievements.description: Beat all heists on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty and show them all you are on top! Completing this will make you golden!

achievements.name: Four more years
achievements.description: Reach level 145. This gives you the presidential masks for further campaigning.

achievements.name: Bank on me
achievements.description: Beat FIRST WORLD BANK on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Hills Street Blues
achievements.description: Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Beat the shield
achievements.description: Beat GREEN BRIDGE on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Brush with death
achievements.description: Beat PANIC ROOM on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Lots of pigs, but no pigs
achievements.description: Beat SLAUGHTERHOUSE on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Bad code
achievements.description: Beat DIAMOND HEIST on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Crowd control
achievements.description: Beat COUNTERFEIT without letting any hostage escape or die. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Quick hands
achievements.description: On COUNTERFEIT, manage to defuse all C4 charges.

achievements.name: Pacifist
achievements.description: Beat COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty or above without killing any law enforcers or civilians. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Blow-out
achievements.description: Beat UNDERCOVER with everyone in the crew only using the GL40. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start. Using melee does not count towards this challenge!

achievements.name: The Saviour
achievements.description: On UNDERCOVER, place 20 planks by yourself on windows, vents or fences.

achievements.name: Detective Gadget
achievements.description: Beat any heist using the STRYK Pistol, AK Rifle, GL40 Grenade Launcher, Toolkit upgrade, Sentry Gun equipment and Big Game Hunters crew bonus. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Under Pressure
achievements.description: Complete COUNTERFEIT on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty.

achievements.name: In for a dime, in for a dollar
achievements.description: Complete UNDERCOVER on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty.

achievements.name: Don't panic
achievements.description: Complete NO MERCY on hard or OVERKILL without any civilian raising the alarm. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: ...or was it the blue one?
achievements.description: In NO MERCY, cut the correct wire opening the ICU door security system. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: That's the wrong door, again!
achievements.description: Complete NO MERCY on OVERKILL difficulty, having sawed open all three ICU security doors. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: Afraid of the dark
achievements.description: Beat NO MERCY on hard or above, getting the power back up within 5 seconds of it being shut down. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

achievements.name: OVERDRILL
achievements.description: Solve the PAYDAY SECRET on any difficulty with any mask and gain access to the OVERVAULT. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
